title: Lenny Le Tyrant
subtitle: Developer · Passionate
intro.text: Hi, I'm Lenny, passionate about application development and technological innovation. I thrive working on challenging projects that combine technical expertise and creativity.
projects.balz.name: Balz.io
projects.balz.desc: A clone of the famous game Agar.io, responsible for server and client development.
projects.balz.desc2: Thousands of views on YouTube, strong player engagement.

projects.cigar3.desc: Open Source Agar.io clone using the WebGL API. 18 stars.
